amendment.description: Amendments en bloc modify language relating to NOAA marine services; provide for the termination of the Corps of Commissioned Officers; provide for the conveyance of the National Marine Fisheries Service Laboratory at Gloucester, Massachusetts; and provide for cleanup at NOAA facilities.
amendment.purpose: An amendment not preprinted in the Congressional Record, to modify language relating to NOAA marine services, provide for the terminiation of the Corps of Commissioned Officers, provide for the conveyance of National Marine Fisheries Service Laboratory at Glouster, Massachusetts, and provide for cleanup of NOAA facilities.

action.text: On agreeing to the Walker amendments (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.
